data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramroodi, Sara, Hajizadeh, Jalil, Joharchi, Omid (2014): Two new species of Cosmolaelaps Berlese (Acari: Laelapidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3847 (4): 533-544, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3847.4.3
